alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 2:13AM MDT until March 15 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow expected mainly above 7500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches across the lower slopes and valleys through Wednesday and 12 to 24 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sawtooths, Big Lost Highlands, and Sun Valley region. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
